results.snippet: Mitragyna speciosa Korth, also known as kratom, is a plant from the Rubiaceae (coffee) family indigenous to South East Asia [1,2,3].Kratom has dose-dependent opioid- and psychostimulant-like properties [1, 4].Said dose-dependent effects of kratom have primarily been attributed to mitragynine as well as its active metabolites 7-hydroxy-mitragynine (7-OH-MTG) and mitragynine pseudo-indoxyl (MTG ...
